EmailTemplate.subject: Meeting request submitted: MEBAA, Dubai, UAE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your meeting request has been received for the Honeywell team in Dubai, UAE. Please allow up to 3 business days to respond with a specific time frame for a meeting.
We look forward to meeting you at the event.
Sincerely, Honeywell GoDirect Team godirect@honeywell.com <[[mailto:godirect@honeywell.com]]>
